channel.title: Old School Essentials: Lorn Song of the Bachelor
channel.description:
I will be running 4 sessions of Lorn Song of the Bachelor by Zedeck Siew using Old School Essentials.
This event is scheduled to run for 3 hours. It will be recorded assuming all parties agree.
There will be 4 sessions in total. Being able to attend each session is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
[The Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html) will be in play and safety tools ([Script Change](http://tinyurl.com/nphed7m) and [X-Card](http://tinyurl.com/x-card-rpg)) will be in use.
Session 1 [date=2020-05-04 time=18:00:00 timezone="America/Chicago"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M4V0JNCsx2rDQfxkZQ6 Session 2 [date=2020-05-11 time=18:00:00 timezone="America/Chicago"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M4V0UMVSVdbdH8i5Zo6 Session 3 [date=2020-05-18 time=18:00:00 timezone="America/Chicago"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M4V0cJnrO1W1d2te4qb Session 4 [date=2020-05-24 time=18:00:00 timezone="America/Chicago"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M4V0jf3wFOJSadGayH6

@Stephen_Karnes wrote:

I will be running 4 sessions of Lorn Song of the Bachelor by Zedeck Siew using Old School Essentials.

This event is scheduled to run for 3 hours. It will be recorded assuming all parties agree.

There will be 4 sessions in total. Being able to attend each session is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.

The Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct will be in play and safety tools (Script Change and X-Card) will be in use.
